sentences.sentence: Standards in the administration of justice have degenerated.
sentences.translation: 司法监管的标准已退化了。

sentences.sentence: However much he may have degenerated, he still knew that this is all that really matters.
sentences.translation: 不管他有多堕落，他仍然知道这才是最重要的。

sentences.sentence: In our own time, America's musical high culture has degenerated into a formulaic entertainment divorced from the contemporary moment.
sentences.translation: 在我们这个时代，美国的音乐高雅文化已经退化为一种脱离当代的俗套娱乐。
